participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i have been married eight years.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i am content with my life.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies.
my favorite food is strawberries.
I spend my day learning about personal finance and investing while watching Star Wars.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
i am trying to open my own teaching program for horse racing.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! What are you up to today?
I'm getting ready to go back to school for the semester.
That's exciting! What are you studying?
I'm studying personal finance and investing.
Oh, that's interesting! What made you decide to study that?
I've always been interested in personal finance, and I think it's important to have a good understanding of it. I also want to open my own teaching program for horse racing.
That's cool! I'm sure you'll do great!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and friends, and I also enjoy watching Star Wars.
Star Wars is awesome! What's your favorite movie?
I love all of them, but I think The Empire Strikes Back is my favorite.
That's my favorite too! It's so good.
It is! I'm so excited to see the new one in December.
Me too! I've been waiting for it for years.
It's going to be so good.
